rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0001
rows.name:
Superbia so full of wasteland and
hard rocks... Not easy for walking!

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0002
rows.name: Shall we take a rest around here?

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0003
rows.name: Good idea, yes!

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0004
rows.name: You need to toughen up a bit, Tora.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0005
rows.name:
Tora live whole life cooped up in
house working on building Hana!
Not used to walking long distance!

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0006
rows.name:
If only Tora could flitter-flutter
like Gramps...

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0007
rows.name:
Well, you have those big
ear...wing...things.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0008
rows.name:
Nopon wings not for flying!
Could flap forever and not reach sky!

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0009
rows.name:
If you're really having a hard time
walking, you could ask Byakko
to give you a ride...

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0010
rows.name: Boss is genius!

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0011
rows.name:
I think not. I have solemnly sworn to
carry none other than my lady.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0012
rows.name: Go on, it can't hurt.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0013
rows.name: Whaaat?!

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0014
rows.name: Are you sure about this, my lady?!

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0015
rows.name:
If you allow Tora to ride me now,
soon he will want Hana to join him,
and there will be no space left for you!

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0016
rows.name: Well, when you put it like that...

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0017
rows.name: Sorry, Tora, guess that's a no.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0018
rows.name: Much disappoint...

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0019
rows.name: Homura, are you okay walking?

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0020
rows.name: Oh yes, I'm fine.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0021
rows.name:
Though all the dust clouds
do bother me a little...

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0022
rows.name:
Oh yeah, those are a pain.
Gets in your eyes sometimes.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0023
rows.name: Hana also not like that.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0024
rows.name:
Small particles get in joints and
cause nasty creaking when moving...

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0025
rows.name:
Must ask Masterpon to clean out
when get out of this place.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0026
rows.name: Boss...

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0027
rows.name:
It seem like Superbia tricky place
for everyone. Boss have any bright
ideas for helping?

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0028
rows.name: Well, let's see...

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0029
rows.name: What would be a good idea?

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0030
rows.name: I could lend out my salvager suits.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0031
rows.name: Just gotta rough it out!

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0101
rows.name:
Would anyone like to borrow one of
my salvager suits?

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0102
rows.name:
I suppose that would help
keep the sand out...

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0103
rows.name:
I've got a spare you could borrow.
You wanna try it on?

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0104
rows.name:
...Actually, I guess Nia's the only one
who it would really fit.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0105
rows.name: Go on then, I'll give it a try.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0106
rows.name:
If it really is useful, we can buy
a whole bunch of 'em sometime!

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0107
rows.name:
My lady...
That suits you surprisingly well.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0108
rows.name: Oh, shurrup.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0109
rows.name:
So this is what it's like for Rex
when he goes salvaging, huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0110
rows.name: Keeps the sand out pretty well, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0111
rows.name: Well, yeah, it does that...

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0112
rows.name:
But I can't really see. Peripheral
vision's awful in this thing.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0113
rows.name: It's hard to move about in, too.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0114
rows.name:
It might not be very practical
for combat...

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0115
rows.name: Yeah, I don't think I could fight like this.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0116
rows.name:
Looks like genius idea of boss
not so genius after all.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0117
rows.name: Well, it was worth a try...

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0201
rows.name: Ah, the old "grin and bear it" solution.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0202
rows.name: Rex not even try to solve problem?

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0203
rows.name:
Well, I mean, listening to you guys
talk about it does make me think that
the sand and dust is a problem...

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0204
rows.name:
But then I realize it never actually
bothered me until you mentioned it.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0205
rows.name:
It's not like it's making our attacks miss
or anything, right? I think we're fighting
as well as we ever have.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0206
rows.name:
It's a bit of an irritation, but it's not
causing any actual problems.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0207
rows.name: I suppose you're right.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0208
rows.name:
Yeah, I guess it's not actually
slowing me down.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0209
rows.name:
Right? So I think as long as we
keep our spirits strong, we can
make it through this just fine.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0210
rows.name:
Well said, Rex!
I'll do my best to keep going then!

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0211
rows.name: I'll try and keep my mind off it, too.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0212
rows.name: All right! Let's keep moving, guys!

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0213
rows.name: Right!

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0214
rows.name: Is this really solution?

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0215
rows.name: Is best solution!
